devdoc.details: The claim contract allows users to claim grants. Any unclaimed tokens may  be recovered by owner after a given deadline.

params.amount: The amount of tokens being granted
params.recipient: The address that is receiving the grant

params.amounts: The amounts of tokens being granted
params.recipients: The addresses that are receiving grants

claim().details: Errors if no tokens are available

params.recipient: The address that has a grant

devdoc.title: Claim

Added(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a new grant is created

ChangedOwner(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the owner of the vesting contract is updated

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when tokens are claimed by a recipient from a grant

Recovered(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when tokens are recovered by owner

claim().notice: Allows a recipient to claim their tokens

tokenGrants(address).notice: Mapping of recipient address > current token grant balance
